name: coderabbit-mysql
author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
title: CodeRabbit with MySQL
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with MySQL/MariaDB. Works with PlanetScale, AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, Azure, etc.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run the SQL schema from storage-mysql.ts.
